arts.ttl: Brighton v Tottenham, Wolves v Leeds in Premier League and more: football – live
arts.sum: ⚽ Premier League updates from the 3pm (BST) kick-offs ⚽ Live scores | Follow us over on Bluesky | And mail Billy Wolves v Leeds team news Wolves (3-4-3): Sá; Mosquera, Agbadou, T Gomes; Tchatchoua, Krejci, J Gomes, R Gomes; Bellegarde, López, Arokodare. Subs: Johnstone, H Bueno, S Bueno, Hoever, Munetsi, André, Strand Larsen, Arias, Hwang. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: One thing has caught Vitor Pereira's eye in Wolves training ahead of Leeds United
arts.sum: If Wolves can harness the spirit and work ethic Pereira has seen in training, there is genuine hope that their fortunes can be turned around, starting with a positive result against Leeds. With pressure mounting after a nightmare start to the season, Pereira has been focused on turning things around on the training ground.

arts.ttl: Chris Sutton picks a clear winner out of Wolves and Leeds United after ‘odd’ Vitor Pereira decision
arts.sum: The 52-year-old has predicted, via the BBC, that the Old Gold will secure a 1-0 win at Molineux saying, “Wolves are without the injured Jorgen Strand Larsen up front, which is a blow, but I am still backing them to win this one – maybe a new contract for Pereira will mean a new dawn for his team?” Chris Sutton has given his verdict for Wolves vs Leeds, and foresees only one winner amid a decision in he labels as ‘odd’.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke set to make huge call for lineup vs Wolves
arts.sum: Leeds United will be hoping they can get their campaign on track after the Fulham result. The loss in London has lead to a lot of noise within the Whites’ fanbase in the past few days. That is because the Whites are winless since the Everton game at the start of the season. arts.ttl: Wolves vs Leeds United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: The pressure is immense at Molineux as Wolves host Leeds United on Saturday, still searching for their first points of the Premier League season. A disastrous start has seen the club lose its opening four league games for the first time in its history, leaving Vítor Pereira’s side rooted to the bottom of the table. arts.ttl: Leeds United XI vs Wolves – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Daniel Farke takes his Leeds United side to Molineux on Saturday, aiming to end a worrying goal drought that has seen them fail to score in their last three Premier League games. arts.ttl: Wolves vs Leeds United – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: A crucial Premier League encounter takes place at Molineux on Saturday as two struggling sides, Wolves and Leeds United, clash in a vital match. arts.ttl: Alarming disciplinary record uncovered as Leeds United face Wolves
arts.sum: When I look to preview Leeds United’s trip to Wolves, it’s clear that anything remotely close to previous clashes would produce another feast. Leeds’ previous two seasons in the Premier League were rough for the most part. Finishing narrowly outside the bottom three in 21/22, Leeds then suffered relegation the following campaign in 22/23. arts.ttl: Wolves confirm major decision ahead of Leeds United clash
arts.sum: Leeds United travel to Molineux in a big clash against bottom-half rivals Wolves this weekend, with both managers facing pressure to get results. While we may only be four games into the season, Molineux is playing host to a very early six-pointer in the Premier League. arts.ttl: Wolves issue Jorgen Strand Larsen injury update after training ahead of Leeds United
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira has confirmed that Jorgen Strand Larsen has trained ahead of Wolves’ match against Leeds United. Jorgen Strand Larsen has been out of action since Wolves’ Carabao Cup clash against West Ham, and Vitor Pereira has provided another update on the Norwegian.
